reviews.review: The acting was excellent.  However, the story line was too typical and predictable.  The ending with the immigrant women standing at the top with the wealthy family at the bottom was too much of a social statement as opposed to a murder mystery.  Just because youre a migrant it doesnt make you good and just because youre rich it doesnt make you bad.  Too much stereotyping and if it was a social statement the movie wanted to make.  Please pick another genre.
Masterfully constructed, with clever social commentary and solid portion of dark homour.
Not your average who-done-it. Unexpected twists and great ensemble play make this a very fun movie.
WHAT A TWIST!!   Just when I thought it was going one way it changed.
Great dialog, plot, and actors. Daniel Craig stole the show. Funny whodunnit similar to Agatha Christie novels in many ways. Best in this genre in decades!

An absolute achievement for writer/director Rian Johnson.
Wikedly crafted. knives out delivers everything a good movie should. Packed with humor,suspense,action, character development,and more plot twists than I can count. Spectacular performances from de armas,Craig,and evans.And powerful messages covered by a witty script.

Johnson delivers a whodunnit that's worthy of standing on the shelves next to Christie and Doyle. A suspenseful murder mystery that will keep audience guessing till the end. Well done Johnson,Keep up the good work.

The perfect murder mystery film. Or at least as close as anyone is ever going to get. This all star cast absolutely throws themselves into this movie, with no hesitation, the leads bounce off one another perfectly. Great pacing, intriguing plot and a perfect payoff at the end, what more is there you want. My only problem was, as a Bond fan, Craig's accent slightly takes you out of it, but that is no fault of his. Really, do yourself a favour and watch this brilliant film!!
This film is one of the most cleaver and great films from the last few years!! I didn't see any holes in the story and it was so entertain from beginning to end!! Highly recommend it!
Knives Out is a great throwback to the classic “whodunit” films. Well written and directed with lots of twist, it does not disappoint.
